title: Contrato n22
body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

title: Are you serious?
body: Change your fucking password or I'll file a report to Kwang-Sun. This is an embarassment and you risk compromising our entire agency you incompetent shithead.
